wikipedia_page.main: Diana Reynell (9 September 1933 – 1 August 2017) was a leading grotto designer and restorer.

response: The restoration of the mound is in part a response to the state of disrepair of the mound since its more aesthetically pleasing appearance as part of Lady Hertford’s garden, as well as the renewal of scholarly interest in the mound and the site. In the 1980s, work commenced on restoring the shell grotto, which was supervised by Diana Reynell and assisted by pupils of Marlborough College."Diana Reynell" in The Times, 5 September 2017, Retrieved 7 September 2017.
